author: wsmoak
msg: Added Maven build files for Shale Framework
- Tests are skipped in core-library due to circular dependency with test-framework
- core-library currently builds only one artifact rather than three (core, spring and tiles)
- No changes were made to the Ant build files (except a few lines in build.properties.sample)

author: elecharny
msg: Now inherit from LdapMessage instead of Asn1Object

author: elecharny
msg: Now inherit from LdapMessage instead of Asn1Object

author: elecharny
msg: - switched from ArrayList to Attributes for attributes
- dealt with attribute's values (which may not be OctetString, but String or byte[])

author: elecharny
msg: - Supressed the DEBUG member and replaced all the if (DEBUG) by if (log.isDebugEnabled())
- changed the initialisation of the attributes, a test has been added to deal witth a null list
